item.title: About me!! :)
item.description: So i’m an engineering student with a lot of curiosity, and i like to learn things for fun :D I advice you that I’m totally cringy and goofy most of the time. I just want to write about the things i learn, reviews, reflections, and maybe some fiction! Also feel free to contact me to say hi if you want! My dm’s are open :3 Contact me # Twitter üê¶
